thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 82 of 625
thread.title: Robin Bird

author: Robin Bird
title: Robin Bird
text: The website itself is easy to use and I was able to find what I wanted to order, when I went to check out it was a nightmare. I entered in a credit card and consistently got an error message. I checked and double checked my card # and expiration date. It took me 10 tries on 2 different computers to get my order through. I am hoping that it will not be a repeat experience on my first order as a VIP, if so I will cancel.
